# One parameter exploration

```{r 2_setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, # hide code and messages
                      cache=TRUE, autodep=TRUE) 

source("library/hpcModel.run.R")
source("library/hpcModel.exploration.R")
source("library/hpcModel.plot.R")
require(reshape2)
require(ggplot2)
require(scales)
require(kableExtra)
```

```{r 2_table-functions}
source("library/plotting/printTableRun.R")
source("library/plotting/printTableExperiment.R")
```

```{r 2_default-values, cache=TRUE}
# this is the 'default' parameter setting (end state is 'fast coevolution'):
# initial populations
initial_population_humans_default = 10
initial_population_plants_default = 10
# number of discrete types
number_types_humans_default = 30
number_types_plants_default = 30    
# undirected variation 
undirected_variation_humans_default = 0.15
undirected_variation_plants_default = 0.15
# intrinsic growth rate 
intrinsic_growth_rate_humans_default = 0.04
intrinsic_growth_rate_plants_default = 0.1
# Utility per capita of individuals of type N
utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_default = 1.5
utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_default = 1
# Utility per capita of individuals of type 1
utility_per_capita_type_1_plants_to_humans_default = 0.15                           
utility_per_capita_type_1_humans_to_plants_default = 0                               
# basic resources:
# population of type N that can be sustained by resources independent of HP relationship
utility_other_to_type_n_humans_default = 10                               
utility_other_to_type_n_plants_default = 20
# population of type 1 that can be sustained by resources independent of HP relationship
utility_other_to_type_1_humans_default = 80                               
utility_other_to_type_1_plants_default = 100                                 
# maximum local area to be used by populations (multiplier or scaling effect)
max_area_default = 200
# settings 
# simulation flow & data
max_iterations_default = 5000
reltol_exponential_default = 6
coevolution_threshold_default = 0.5
messages_default = TRUE
```

```{r 2_plot-functions, include=FALSE}
# this chunk is specific for this exploration 

plotDirectory <- "plots/2_exp_"

source("library/plotting/bifurcationPlot.R")
```

\newpage

## Full example (table+plot alternatives)

### utility per capita **of** type n plants **to** humans ($\bar{U}_{P_{n}H}$):

```{r 2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans-values, cache=TRUE}
exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_name <- "utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans"
exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_values <- seq(0.5, 2.5, length.out = 100)
```

```{r 2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans, cache=TRUE, dependson=c('2_default-values', '2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans-values'), include=FALSE}
exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans <- hpcModel.exploration(
  initial_population_humans = initial_population_humans_default,
  initial_population_plants = initial_population_plants_default,
  number_types_humans = number_types_humans_default,         
  number_types_plants = number_types_plants_default,        
  undirected_variation_humans = undirected_variation_humans_default,
  undirected_variation_plants = undirected_variation_plants_default,
  intrinsic_growth_rate_humans = intrinsic_growth_rate_humans_default, 
  intrinsic_growth_rate_plants = intrinsic_growth_rate_plants_default, 
  utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans = exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_values, ###
  utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants = utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_default,
  utility_per_capita_type_1_plants_to_humans = utility_per_capita_type_1_plants_to_humans_default,                                  
  utility_per_capita_type_1_humans_to_plants = utility_per_capita_type_1_humans_to_plants_default,                                   
  utility_other_to_type_n_humans = utility_other_to_type_n_humans_default,                                
  utility_other_to_type_n_plants = utility_other_to_type_n_plants_default, 
  utility_other_to_type_1_humans = utility_other_to_type_1_humans_default,                               
  utility_other_to_type_1_plants = utility_other_to_type_1_plants_default,                                 
  max_area = max_area_default, 
  max_iterations = max_iterations_default,
  reltol_exponential = reltol_exponential_default,
  coevolution_threshold = coevolution_threshold_default,
  messages = messages_default
)
```

```{r 2mUPnHtablehtml, eval=!params$ispdf, cache=TRUE, dependson='2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans'}
printTableExperiment(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans, caption = 'Parameter setting')
```

```{r 2mUPnHtablepdf, eval=params$ispdf, cache=TRUE, dependson='2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans'}
printTableExperiment(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans, caption = 'Parameter setting', output = "latex")
```

```{r 2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans-bifplot1, cache=TRUE, dependson='2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans', include=FALSE}
plotScale = 10
#svg('paste0(plotDirectory, exp1_name, "_ggbifplot.png"), width=plotScale, height=plot_scale)
png(paste0(plotDirectory, exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_name, "_bifurcationPlotSimple.png"),
    width = 200 * plotScale, height = 100 * plotScale)
bifurcationPlotSimple(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_values, 
                      cbind(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans$coevolution_coefficient_humans, 
                            exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans$coevolution_coefficient_plants),
                      legend_position = c(2.2, 0),
                      parameter_x_label = expression(paste('utility per capita of type n plants to humans (', bar('U')['PnH'], ')')),
                      variable_y_label = "coevolution coefficient",
                      variable_names = c("Humans", "Plants"),
                      cex = plotScale)
dev.off()
```

```{r 2mUPnHbifplot1print, echo=FALSE, dependson='2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans-bifplot1', out.width = '100%', fig.cap='Bifurcation plot (ggplot2)'}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0(plotDirectory, exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_name, "_bifurcationPlotSimple.png"))
```

```{r 2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans-bifplot2, cache=TRUE, dependson='2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans', results='hide'}
plotScale = 10

#svg(paste0(plotDirectory, exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_name, "_bifurcationPlotPair.svg"), width=plotScale, height=plot_scale)

    width = 400 * plotScale, height = 150 * plotScale)
bifurcationPlotPair(cbind(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_values, exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans$coevolution_coefficient_humans), 
                    cbind(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_values, exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans$coevolution_coefficient_plants), 
                    parameter_x_label = expression(paste('utility per capita of type n plants to humans (', bar('U')['PnH'], ')')),
                    variable_y_label_A = expression(paste('coevolution coefficient of humans (', 'coevo'['H'], ')')),
                    variable_y_label_B = expression(paste('coevolution coefficient of plants (', 'coevo'['P'], ')')),
                    plot_scale = plotScale)
dev.off()
```

```{r 2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans-bifplot2-print, echo=FALSE, dependson='2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans-bifplot2', out.width = '100%'}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0(plotDirectory, exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_name, "_bifurcationPlotPair.png"))
```

## Exploration on 'default' setting for each parameter:

### Initial populations of humans and plants ($init_{H},\,init_{P}$)

```{r 2_init-values, cache=TRUE}
exp_initial_population_plants_name <- "initial_population_plants"

exp_initial_population_plants_values <- 5:100
```

## Oscilations

```{r 2_oscillation-values, cache=TRUE, dependson='2_default-values'}
exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_name <- "utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation"
exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation_name <- "utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation"
exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_values <- seq(0.1, 1.5, length.out = 100)
exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation_values <- seq(0.1, 1, length.out = 100)
initial_population_humans_oscillation = initial_population_humans_default
initial_population_plants_oscillation = initial_population_plants_default
number_types_humans_oscillation = number_types_humans_default
number_types_plants_oscillation = number_types_plants_default
undirected_variation_humans_oscillation = undirected_variation_humans_default
undirected_variation_plants_oscillation = undirected_variation_plants_default
intrinsic_growth_rate_humans_oscillation = intrinsic_growth_rate_humans_default
intrinsic_growth_rate_plants_oscillation = intrinsic_growth_rate_plants_default
utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation = 0.5 ### value for getting oscillation
utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation = 0.9 ### value for getting oscillation
utility_per_capita_type_1_plants_to_humans_oscillation = 0.5 # utility type 1 plant is the same than type n plants and higher than default
utility_per_capita_type_1_humans_to_plants_oscillation = utility_per_capita_type_1_humans_to_plants_default#0.1                                 
utility_other_to_type_n_humans_oscillation = 20 # baseline carrying capacity for type n humans is higher than default
utility_other_to_type_n_plants_oscillation = utility_other_to_type_n_plants_default
utility_other_to_type_1_humans_oscillation = 100 # baseline carrying capacity for type 1 humans is higher than default 
utility_other_to_type_1_plants_oscillation = utility_other_to_type_1_plants_default                              
max_area_oscillation = max_area_default
max_iterations_oscillation = 1000
reltol_exponential_oscillation = Inf
save_trajectories_oscillation = TRUE
```

Bifurcation plot with last 100 time steps (of `r max_iterations_oscillation`) to capture oscillations or 'slow' asymptotic stability


```{r 2_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation, cache=TRUE, dependson='2_oscillation-values', include=FALSE}
if(!file.exists('data/2_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_humans.RData'))
{
  exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_humans <- data.frame()
  exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_plants <- data.frame()
  
  for (i in exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_values)
  {
    temp <- hpcModel.run(
      initial_population_humans = initial_population_humans_oscillation,
      initial_population_plants = initial_population_plants_oscillation,
      number_types_humans = number_types_humans_oscillation,         
      number_types_plants = number_types_plants_oscillation,        
      undirected_variation_humans = undirected_variation_humans_oscillation,
      undirected_variation_plants = undirected_variation_plants_oscillation,
      intrinsic_growth_rate_humans = intrinsic_growth_rate_humans_oscillation, 
      intrinsic_growth_rate_plants = intrinsic_growth_rate_plants_oscillation, 
      utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans = utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation,
      utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants = i, ###
      utility_per_capita_type_1_plants_to_humans = utility_per_capita_type_1_plants_to_humans_oscillation,                                  
      utility_per_capita_type_1_humans_to_plants = utility_per_capita_type_1_humans_to_plants_oscillation,                                   
      utility_other_to_type_n_humans = utility_other_to_type_n_humans_oscillation,                                
      utility_other_to_type_n_plants = utility_other_to_type_n_plants_oscillation, 
      utility_other_to_type_1_humans = utility_other_to_type_1_humans_oscillation,                               
      utility_other_to_type_1_plants = utility_other_to_type_1_plants_oscillation,                                 
      max_area = max_area_oscillation, 
      # settings 
      # simulation flow & data
      max_iterations = max_iterations_oscillation,
      reltol_exponential = tol_oscillation,
      coevolution_threshold = coevolution_threshold_default,
      save_trajectories = save_trajectories_oscillation,
      messages = messages_default
    )
    
    # store the result
    exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_humans <-
      rbind(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_humans, 
            data.frame(i, temp$TRAJECTORIES$coevolution_coefficient_humans[(max_iterations_oscillation - 100):(max_iterations_oscillation - 1)]))
    exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_plants <-
      rbind(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_plants, 
            data.frame(i, temp$TRAJECTORIES$coevolution_coefficient_plants[(max_iterations_oscillation - 100):(max_iterations_oscillation - 1)]))
    
  }
  # save
  save(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_humans, file = 'data/2_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_humans.RData')
  save(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_plants, file = 'data/2_utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation_plants.RData')
}
```

```{r 2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation, cache=TRUE, dependson='2_oscillation-values', include=FALSE}
{
  temp <- hpcModel.run(
    initial_population_humans = initial_population_humans_oscillation,
    initial_population_plants = initial_population_plants_oscillation,
    number_types_humans = number_types_humans_oscillation,         
    number_types_plants = number_types_plants_oscillation,        
    undirected_variation_humans = undirected_variation_humans_oscillation,
    undirected_variation_plants = undirected_variation_plants_oscillation,
    intrinsic_growth_rate_humans = intrinsic_growth_rate_humans_oscillation, 
    intrinsic_growth_rate_plants = intrinsic_growth_rate_plants_oscillation, 
    utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans = i, ###
    utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants = utility_per_capita_type_n_humans_to_plants_oscillation,
    utility_per_capita_type_1_plants_to_humans = utility_per_capita_type_1_plants_to_humans_oscillation,                                  
    utility_per_capita_type_1_humans_to_plants = utility_per_capita_type_1_humans_to_plants_oscillation,                                   
    utility_other_to_type_n_humans = utility_other_to_type_n_humans_oscillation,                                
    utility_other_to_type_n_plants = utility_other_to_type_n_plants_oscillation, 
    utility_other_to_type_1_humans = utility_other_to_type_1_humans_oscillation,                               
    utility_other_to_type_1_plants = utility_other_to_type_1_plants_oscillation,                                 
    max_area = max_area_oscillation, 
    # settings 
    # simulation flow & data
    max_iterations = max_iterations_oscillation,
    reltol_exponential = reltol_exponential_oscillation,
    coevolution_threshold = coevolution_threshold_default,
    save_trajectories = save_trajectories_oscillation,
    messages = messages_default
  )
  
  # store the result
  exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation_humans <-
    rbind(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation_humans, 
          data.frame(i, temp$TRAJECTORIES$coevolution_coefficient_humans[(max_iterations_oscillation - 100):(max_iterations_oscillation - 1)]))
  exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation_plants <-
    rbind(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation_plants, 
          data.frame(i, temp$TRAJECTORIES$coevolution_coefficient_plants[(max_iterations_oscillation - 100):(max_iterations_oscillation - 1)]))
  
}

# save
  save(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation_humans, file = 'data/2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation_humans.RData')
  save(exp_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation_plants, file = 'data/2_utility_per_capita_type_n_plants_to_humans_oscillation_plants.RData')
}
```
